One of  two classic versions of Faust.(the other is the Grundgens version on DGG) It was produced by WDR Cologne in March 1952 and reissued on CDs by Litraton in 1999. As you would expect a technically superb example of audio conservation (apart from a little bit of tape echo) Kindly seed
